com.btmatthews.atlas.core.dao

Interface DAO<I>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - The interface that describes the persistent entity.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MongoDAO

    public interface DAO<I>
    Describes the interface for data access objects that persist entities of described by the interface I to a data store.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Brian Thomas Matthews

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long count()
      Count the number of entities described by I in the data source.
      void create(I entity)
      Persist a newly created entity in the data store.
      void destroy(I entity)
      Delete a persistent entity from the data store.
      List<I> find(Paging paging)
      Retrieve a portion of the ordered entities described by interface I from the data store.
      I read(String id)
      Retrieve a persistent entity from the data store.
      void update(I entity)
      Update a persistent entity in the data store.

    • Method Detail

      • count

        long count()
        Count the number of entities described by I in the data source.
        Returns:
        The number of entities.

      • find

        List<I> find(Paging paging)
        Retrieve a portion of the ordered entities described by interface I from the data store.
        Parameters:
        paging - Describes the portion of the result set to return.
        Returns:
        An ordered list of I entities.

      • create

        void create(I entity)
        Persist a newly created entity in the data store.
        Parameters:
        entity - The newly created entity.

      • read

        I read(String id)
        Retrieve a persistent entity from the data store.
        Parameters:
        id - The object identifier of the persistent entity.
        Returns:
        The persistent entity.

      • update

        void update(I entity)
        Update a persistent entity in the data store.
        Parameters:
        entity - The persistent entity.

      • destroy

        void destroy(I entity)
        Delete a persistent entity from the data store.
        Parameters:
        entity - The persistent entity.
